me.lucko.helper.messaging

Interface ChannelListener<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the channel message type
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ChannelListener<T>
    Represents an object listening to messages sent on the channel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessage(ChannelAgent<T> agent, T message)
      Called when a message is posted to this listener.

    • Method Detail

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(@Nonnull
               ChannelAgent<T> agent,
               @Nonnull
               T message)
        Called when a message is posted to this listener.

        This method is called asynchronously.

        Parameters:
        agent - the agent which forwarded the message.
        message - the message
